description:
This video is about the "finger" command. Now this command is not often seen on computers these days. It's more of a relic from the old neckbeard Unix days of the past. But it's still a neat little command.

REFERENCED:
► https://linux.die.net/man/1/finger

title: The Basics Of The Finger Command On Linux
